title: Slush Block
summaries: Slush Blocks are blocks that appear naturally in Ice biomes. They are subject to gravity and will fall if the blocks supporting them are removed, dealing damage to any player or enemy they fall on (similar to Sand and Silt).

Slush can be placed in an <linked>Extractinator</linked> or <linked>Chlorophyte Extractinator</linked> to be converted into various valuable materials, including <linked>gems</linked>, <linked>coins</linked>, <linked>ores</linked>, and very rarely, the <linked>Amber Mosquito</linked> <linked>pet</linked> summoning item.
